text: {"answer":"N","reasoning":"ii is incorrect: under the parentelic system, descendants (children) exclude parents; “oldest parentel” does not mean only the oldest generation inherits when children exist. iii is incorrect: human rights are widely argued to be justifiable on non-Western and/or universal grounds. iv is incorrect: Swiss contract law uses the principle of trust (Vertrauensprinzip); equally admissible divergent understandings can still yield a contract based on objective interpretation. v is incorrect: proportionality is a separate constitutional requirement; a sufficient legal basis does not automatically make state action proportionate."}
